summary: This bill, H.R. 2307, aims to modernize the National Agricultural Statistics Service (NASS). It establishes a commission to study NASS data collection and reporting processes, offering recommendations for improvements like streamlining data collection, using new technologies, and improving stakeholder collaboration. The commission will consist of members from various government agencies and committees, and is tasked with submitting a report with its findings and recommendations. The bill authorizes $1,000,000 for fiscal year 2026 to fund the commission.
